org.treetank.axis
Class AbsAxis

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.axis.AbsAxis
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Long>, Iterator<Long>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbsFilter, AncestorAxis, AttributeAxis, ChildAxis, DescendantAxis, FilterAxis, FollowingAxis, FollowingSiblingAxis, LevelOrderAxis, NestedAxis, ParentAxis, PostOrderAxis, PrecedingAxis, PrecedingSiblingAxis, SelfAxis
public abstract class AbsAxis
extends Object
implements Iterator<Long>, Iterable<Long>

AbstractAxis

Provide standard Java iterator capability compatible with the new enhanced for loop available since Java 5.

All implementations must make sure to call super.hasNext() as the first thing in hasNext().

All users must make sure to call next() after hasNext() evaluated to true.

resetToStartKey

protected final long resetToStartKey()
Make sure the transaction points to the node it started with. This must be called just before hasNext() == false.

Returns:
Key of node where transaction was before the first call of hasNext().

resetToLastKey

protected final long resetToLastKey()
Make sure the transaction points to the node after the last hasNext(). This must be called first in hasNext().

Returns:
Key of node where transaction was after the last call of hasNext().
